'재단여유(유직사) ', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '220', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSI', 'HOSI_KNIT_LOSS', 79, 'LOSS길이(유직사) ', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '260', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSI', 'HOSI_OUT0_MRGN', 80, '재단여유(외고무) ', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '220', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSI', 'HOSI_OUT0_LOSS', 81, 'LOSS길이(외고무) ', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '260', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSI', 'HOSI_RADI_YN', 82, 'RADIATOR HOSE여부', 'CHAR', '1', 'C', '300', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CREATED_YN ,CASE WHEN C.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END COMMENTS_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE >= A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END UPDATED_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NULL THEN 'I' WHEN A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE > D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_COLM_ALGN != D.PKCL_COLM_ALGN THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_WITH_SCRN != D.PKCL_WITH_SCRN THEN 'U' ELSE 'X' END MG_MODE ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COLUMNS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS C ON C.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND C.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CITBPKCL D ON D.PKCL_CORP_CODE = A.PKCL_CORP_CODE AND D.PKCL_COME_CODE = A.PKCL_COME_CODE AND D.PKCL_TABL_ID = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND D.PKCL_COLM_ID = A.PKCL_COLM_ID ORDER BY A.PKCL_SORT_NUMB

CREATE TABLE CATBHOSI ( HOSI_CORP_CODE VARCHAR2(4) ,HOSI_PART_NO VARCHAR2(20) ,HOSI_EONO VARCHAR2(20) ,HOSI_CUMT_NO NUMBER(10, 0) ,HOSI_MATL_CORP VARCHAR2(4) ,HOSI_MATL_STND CHAR(1) ,HOSI_MATL_CODE VARCHAR2(16) ,HOSI_MATL_APDT CHAR(8) ,HOSI_MATL_GUBN CHAR(3) ,HOSI_GRVT_NUMB NUMBER(7, 4) ,HOSI_THIK_SIZE NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSI_HOSE_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSI_INJT_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSI_MID0_CORP VARCHAR2(4) ,HOSI_MID0_STND CHAR(1) ,HOSI_MID0_CODE VARCHAR2(16) ,HOSI_MID0_APDT CHAR(8) ,HOSI_MID0_GUBN CHAR(3) ,HOSI_MID0_GRVT NUMBER(7, 4) ,HOSI_MID0_THIK NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSI_MID0_PRIC NUMBER(14, 6) ,HOSI_UJIK_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSI_UJIK_PRIC NUMBER(14, 6) ,HOSI_UJIK_THIK NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSI_OUT0_CORP VARCHAR2(4) ,HOSI_OUT0_STND CHAR(1) ,HOSI_OUT0_CODE VARCHAR2(16) ,HOSI_OUT0_APDT CHAR(8) ,HOSI_OUT0_GUBN CHAR(3) ,HOSI_OUT0_GRVT NUMBER(7, 4) ,HOSI_OUT0_THIK NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSI_IN00_SIZE NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSI_IN00_MACD VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSI_MID0_MACD VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSI_OUT0_SIZE NUMBER(10, 2) WITH T1 (C1, C2) AS ( SELECT 'CORP_CODE','법인코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'COME_CODE','공법' FROM DUAL ) SELECT * FROM T1
